name: Lost Morten
description:
Lost Morten is a casual platformer with some metroidvania elements where we follow Wisp, a spirit that travels through mysterious lands together with the spirits of animals that died. Wisp along with his companions will have to conquer the challenges that they will encounter, if they wish to continue with their journey.

Use WASD to control your character. Some animals have special interactions that can be used by pressing SPACE.

As you progress on your game you will unlock new forms that will let you do many different things. These new forms can be used on previous levels to find hidden secrets.

After you beat the game try doing another run with all the forms unlocked and find all the hidden crystals!
